content: Battery optimization settings don't actually work. Tried every combination. Still drains fast. False advertising on battery life specs.
Camera app is slow to launch. Miss quick photo opportunities. Takes 3-4 seconds to open which is too long for spontaneous shots.
Menu icons are not descriptive. Have to guess what each button does. Tooltips would help. Very unintuitive design choices.
Standby battery drain is unacceptable. Loses 30% overnight with all apps closed. Something is running in background constantly.
Portrait mode edge detection is excellent. Creates professional looking photos. Depth effect is very natural. Impressed!
Dark mode implementation is inconsistent. Some screens are dark, others are bright white. Hurts eyes switching between them.
Camera quality degrades after software updates. Photos were crisp before, now they're processed and artificial looking.
Search function in settings doesn't work properly. Can't find features even when typing exact names. Very frustrating.
Fast charging damages battery health quickly. Dropped to 90% capacity in 4 months. Should warn users about this tradeoff.
Overall the product has potential but needs serious improvements in battery life, UI design, and camera consistency. Hope they listen to feedback.
